review: Oh my gosh--why did we wait so long to purchase the Fire TV stick?!  We kept on having problems staying connected to our wireless shows.  This improved our connection 1,000%  No kidding!  We are older and retired, and kept on putting off this purchase thinking it would be difficult. Instead, just opened the box, let it do it's thing with a couple of prompts, and were watching Netflix in minutes.  Next up is Bosch on Amazon Prime TV.  We are excited knowing we can take this on vacation with us.  We cut the cord and do not have any cable or dish.  Can you tell we are extremely pleased?
author: Carol L. Pigg "piglet"
